entailment.premise: Two women are embracing while holding to go packages.
entailment.label: entailment
entailment.explanation: Saying the two women are holding packages is a way to paraphrase that the packages they are holding are to go packages.

entailment.premise: Two young children in blue jerseys, one with the number 9 and one with the number 2 are standing on wooden steps in a bathroom and washing their hands in a sink.
entailment.hypothesis: Two kids in numbered jerseys wash their hands.
entailment.label: entailment
entailment.explanation: Young children are kids. Jerseys with number 9 and 2 are numbered jerseys.

entailment.premise: A man selling donuts to a customer during a world exhibition event held in the city of Angeles
entailment.hypothesis: A man selling donuts to a customer.
entailment.label: entailment
entailment.explanation: A man selling donuts is selling donuts.

neutral.premise: Two women are embracing while holding to go packages.
neutral.hypothesis: The sisters are hugging goodbye while holding to go packages after just eating lunch.
neutral.label: neutral
neutral.explanation: The to go packages may not be from lunch.

neutral.premise: Two young children in blue jerseys, one with the number 9 and one with the number 2 are standing on wooden steps in a bathroom and washing their hands in a sink.
neutral.hypothesis: Two kids at a ballgame wash their hands.
neutral.label: neutral
neutral.explanation: Two kids in jerseys watching their hands are not necessarily at  a ballgame.

neutral.premise: A man selling donuts to a customer during a world exhibition event held in the city of Angeles
neutral.hypothesis: A man selling donuts to a customer during a world exhibition event while people wait in line behind him.
neutral.label: neutral
neutral.explanation: Just because a customer buys donuts at a world exhibition event doesn't mean people are waiting in line behind him.

contradiction.premise: Two women are embracing while holding to go packages.
contradiction.hypothesis: The men are fighting outside a deli.
contradiction.label: contradiction
contradiction.explanation: In the first sentence there is an action of affection between women while on the second sentence there is a fight between men.

contradiction.premise: Two young children in blue jerseys, one with the number 9 and one with the number 2 are standing on wooden steps in a bathroom and washing their hands in a sink.
contradiction.hypothesis: Two kids in jackets walk to school.
contradiction.label: contradiction
contradiction.explanation: If you're wearing a jacket, you won't be able to see the blue jerseys. When you're standing in a bathroom, you cannot be walking to school at the same time.

contradiction.premise: A man selling donuts to a customer during a world exhibition event held in the city of Angeles
contradiction.hypothesis: A woman drinks her coffee in a small cafe.
contradiction.label: contradiction
contradiction.explanation: There can be either a man or a woman, who can be either selling donuts or drinking coffee.
